mapper.insert: insert into HotelReservation (hr_num, c_num, h_num, hr_child, hr_adult, hr_chekin, hr_chekout, hr_status) values (hotelreservation_seq.nextval, #{c_num}, #{h_num}, #{hr_child}, #{hr_adult}, #{hr_chekin}, #{hr_chekout}, #{hr_status} )
mapper.update: update HotelReservation set hr_child=#{hr_child}, hr_adult=#{hr_adult}, hr_chekin=#{hr_chekin}, hr_chekout=#{hr_chekout}, where hr_num = #{hr_num}
